name: Justification

properties.name: LEFT
properties.description: Aligns the left edges, leaving the right edge ragged.

properties.name: CENTER
properties.description: Text is centered on each line.

properties.name: RIGHT
properties.description: Aligns the right edges, leaving the left edge ragged.

properties.name: LEFTJUSTIFIED
properties.description: Justifies all lines except the last, which is left-aligned.

properties.name: CENTERJUSTIFIED
properties.description: Justifies all lines except the last, which is center-aligned.

properties.name: RIGHTJUSTIFIED
properties.description: Justifies all lines except the last, which is right-aligned.

properties.name: FULLYJUSTIFIED
properties.description: Justifies all lines including the last, which is force-justified.

description: The placement of paragraph text within the bounding box.
